entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:27 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: S 7 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the morning. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
